name: ElasticMapReduceEbsConfigurationEbsBlockDeviceConfigVolumeSpecification
description: VolumeSpecification is a property of the Amazon Elastic MapReduce EbsConfiguration property that configures the Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes that Amazon Elastic MapReduce (Amazon EMR) associates with your instances.

properties.name: Iops
properties.description: The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) that the volume supports. For more information, see Iops for the EbsBlockDevice action in the Amazon EC2 API Reference.

properties.name: SizeInGB
properties.description: The volume size, in Gibibytes (GiB). For more information about specifying the volume size, see VolumeSize for the EbsBlockDevice action in the Amazon EC2 API Reference.

properties.name: VolumeType
properties.description: The volume type, such as standard or io1. For more information about specifying the volume type, see VolumeType for the EbsBlockDevice action in the Amazon EC2 API Reference.
